description_i18n.en-US: Use Query String query syntax to match one or more fields with a single operator (OR or AND).
Search for a text match over multiple text fields.

fields.helpText: Only use fuzziness with the following match types: most fields, best fields, bool prefix.
fields.label: Fuzziness
fields.name: fuzziness

fields.helpText: Only use slop with the following match types: phrase, phrase prefix.
fields.label: Slop
fields.name: slop

fields.helpText: If this is set, the search terms entered in the search bar will be replaced by this value.
fields.label: Text to Match
fields.name: keywords

description_i18n.en-US: Hide contents with an exact term match on the given field.
Do not search for comments.
Hide contents in the given category.
Hide assets which are marked not searchable. This Element duplicates the functionality of a Liferay Search Framework query clause.
Hide contents with a given tag.
Filter results by one or multiple terms. At least one must match.
Limit search to contents created within the given time range.

title_i18n.en-US: Limit Search to Contents Created Within a Period of Time

description_i18n.en-US: Limit the search to return only the HEAD version of Web Content articles. This Element duplicates the functionality of a Liferay Search Framework query clause.
Limit the search to contents the user is an owner of.
Limit the search scope to the sites that the user is a member of.
Limit the search to PDF files, as recorded in the mimeType field.
Limit the search to contents that are published.
Limit the search to the current site.

title_i18n.en-US: Limit Search to the Current Site

description_i18n.en-US: Limit the search scope to the given sites.
Show only contents with a display date that's not in the future. This Element duplicates the functionality of a Liferay Search Framework query clause.
Show only published contents on live sites. Show only published and staged contents on staging sites. This Element duplicates the functionality of a Liferay Search Framework query clause.
Boost contents in a category if the user's search keywords contain any of the given keywords.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category by Keyword Match

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents in a category for the given period of time.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category for a Period of Time

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents in a category for users belonging to the given user segments.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category for User Segments

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents in a category if a user is not logged in.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category for Guest Users

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents in a category for user accounts created within the given time.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category for New User Accounts

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents in a category based on the time of day.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents in a Category for the Time of Day

description_i18n.en-US: Boost certain Web Content if the user's search keywords contain the given keywords.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Web Contents by Keyword Match

description_i18n.en-US: Hide contents in a category if the user is not logged in.

title_i18n.en-US: Hide Contents in a Category for Guest Users

description_i18n.en-US: Boost contents if the search keywords match in the given fields.

fields.helpText: If this is set, the search terms entered in the search bar will be replaced by this value.
fields.label: Text to Match
fields.name: keywords

description_i18n.en-US: Boost the given asset type.
Boost contents having a default language matching the current session language.

title_i18n.en-US: Boost Contents for the Current Language

description_i18n.en-US: Boost and promote contents in a given category.
Boost contents on sites the user is a member of.
Boost contents edited more often.
Boost contents modified recently using a Gaussian function.
Boost contents with longer content in the user's current language.
Boost contents in closer proximity to the search user with a Gaussian function. Additional setup is required.
Boost contents having at least one of the given tags.
Boost contents with an exact keyword match to a tag.
